product_name: Pacsafe Venturesafe 325 GII Cross Body Pack
long_description: Sized for an iPad and built to prevent theft during travel, the Pacsafe Venturesafe 325 G2 Cross Body pack keeps important items secure. Wear it on your back as a sling or on the front for security.
short_description: Sized for an iPad and built to prevent theft during travel, the Pacsafe Venturesafe 325 G2 Cross Body pack keeps important items secure. Wear it on your back as a sling or on the front for security.
